name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Interactive Design, Architecture and Engineering（ICIDAE 2022）
content: 2022 2nd International Conference on Interactive Design, Architecture and Engineering（ICIDAE 2022） will be held in Faculty Of Architecture, Warsaw University Of Technology, Warsaw, Poland during May 25-27, 2022\. It brings together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of interactive design, architecture and engineering. Prof. Nuno Dinis Corticos from Universidade de Lisboa, Portugal, and Prof. Nobuo MISHIMA from Faculty of Science and Engineering, Saga University, Japan will give keynote speach. All the registered and presented papers will be published into Materials Science Forum (ISSN web 1662-9752), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc. Submission Deadline Before Feb 01, 2022 Notification of Acceptance On Feb. 15, 2022 Registration Deadline Before Feb. 25, 2022 Conference Dates On May 25-26, 2022 Paper submission: 1.Conference Submission System: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/ICIDAE2022 2.Mail: icidae@isaeri.org Conference Secretary: Ms. Alice Li Tell: +852-30756685 Mail: icidae@isaeri.org Conference website: www.icidae.org
organizers: Faculty of Architecture, Warsaw University of Technology
